mapper.select:
select usernum, username, age, userid, userpwd, address, hp1, hp2, hp3, departnum, userrolelevel, gender from user_info where 1=1
and username like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
mapper.insert: insert user_info(username, age, userid, userpwd, address, hp1, hp2, hp3, departnum, userrolelevel, gender) values(#{username},#{age},#{userid},#{userpwd},#{address},#{hp1},#{hp2},#{hp3},#{departnum}, #{userrolelevel},#{gender})
